name: Advanced ARC Powercell
uses: Refiner I prerequisite via ARC Powercell
notes: Keep if you still need standard ARC Powercells to unlock/upgrade benches.

name: Advanced Electrical Components
uses: Gear Bench III ×5; Utility Station III ×5; Project IV ×5
notes: Gate for higher bench tiers; keep until upgrades complete.

name: Agave
notes: Treat as nature currency; either non‑recyclable or converts to Assorted Seeds.

name: Antiseptic
uses: Medical Lab III ×8; Quest: Doctor’s Orders ×2
notes: Bench and quest item; recycle only after upgrades.

name: Apricot
notes: Keep for Scrappy companion training milestones.

name: ARC Alloy
uses: Explosives/Medical/Utility Station I unlocks; Projects I ×80
notes: Common mid‑tier crafting foundation; keep a healthy stack.

name: ARC Motion Core
notes: Hold if you still need Refiner II.

name: Assorted Seeds
uses: Trade with Celeste; Scrappy fruit milestones

name: Bastion Cell
recycle_outputs: ARC Motion Core ×2; Advanced Mechanical Components ×2

name: Bombardier Cell
notes: Hold until late‑game benches are finished.

name: Burned Tick Pod
notes: Basic scrap; recycle unless a quest needs it.

name: Complex Gun Parts
notes: Break down if you need base parts.

name: Cracked Bioscanner
notes: Keep until bench upgrades are done.

name: Damaged Wasp Driver
notes: Keep if you still need Workshop upgrades.

name: Damaged Snitch Scanner
notes: Recycle unless a quest calls for it.

name: Dog Collar
notes: Needed for companion upgrade; do not recycle until complete.

name: Duct Tape
notes: Keep or recycle depending on stock.

name: Durable Cloth
uses: Medical Lab II ×5; Project II ×35; Quest: Doctor’s Orders ×1

name: Electrical Components
uses: Gear Bench II ×5; Utility Station II ×5; Project II ×30
notes: Bench and project bottleneck; keep first.

name: Fertilizer
notes: Quest‑gated; convert to seeds if surplus.

name: Lightbulb
notes: Keep until expedition stages are cleared.

name: Metal Parts
notes: Common recycle output; not recycled further.

name: Rubber Parts
notes: Common recycle output; not recycled further.

name: Plastic Parts
notes: Common recycle output; not recycled further.

name: Wires
notes: Common recycle output; not recycled further.

name: Batteries
notes: Common recycle output; not recycled further.

name: Simple Gun Parts
notes: Result of breaking down Complex Gun Parts.

name: Water Filter
notes: Recycle unless needed for a quest.

name: Very Comfortable Pillow
notes: Keep if your companion progression calls for it.
